comment: I get Payday on the nose big time, nutty. The finish obviously starts in your mouth but then ends right there, nothing past that. It’s not a hot finish to me at all. It’s definitely different than your standard rye but worth a shot!

Nose of caramel, citrus, oak, brown butter
On the palette notes of summer citrus, black pepper, toffee, coco, vanilla bean
lingering finish of black pepper, oak, brown butter
